title: WAMC News Podcast - Episode 329
dc:creator: WAMC Northeast Public Radio
description: The college football season has kicked off, and the University at Albany has a tall order in its opener today. The Great Danes are in Waco, Texas to face No. 10 Baylor, the reigning Big 12 champion, before a home game against Colonial Athletic Association foe New Hampshire Sept. 10. Head coach Greg Gattuso is entering his ninth season and is looking to bring UAlbany back to the FCS playoffs for the first time since 2019.
